dct_title_s: Plano de la ciudad de Quito : levantado por orden del Sr. General don Rafael Almeida S. jefe del E.M.G. y obsequiado al illustre concejo municipal de Quito en homenaje al centenario de la Batalla de Pichincha / los officiales topógrafos Ezequiel Rivadeneira, Luis Hererra ; Jeffe del E.M.G. (Sheet 1)
dct_description_sm: Relief shown in contours with 5 meter intervals. Oriented with northwest toward top right corner. Map shows electric and steam trams, hydrants, quarries, masonry bridges, development plans, and isolated buildings. Parishes are located by color coating with legend.
dct_publisher_sm: Quito : Estado Mayor General del Ejército, 1922.
Quito : Litografía de la Escuela de Bellas Arles, 1922.
